1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall -fno-warn-orphans #-}
2
3-- | Parts of clock and time.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Type.Time.Parts
6  ( -- * Modified Julian Day
7    Mjd,
8    mjdInteger,
9    ToMjd (..),
10    ToMjdClip (..),
11
12    -- * Day of week
13    Dayw (..),
14    mjdDayw,
15    daywDiff,
16
17    -- * Date parts
18    Year, Month, Week, Day,
19    DateParts (..),
20    dateYmd, dateYwd, dateYd, dateEom, dateYmnd,
21
22    -- * Clock parts
23    Days, Hour, Min, Sec,
24    ClockParts (..),
25    clockDhms, clockDhm, clockDh, clockD,
26  ) where
27
28import qualified Data.Time.Calendar                 as Tim
29import qualified Data.Time.Calendar.WeekDate        as Tim
30import qualified Data.Time.Calendar.OrdinalDate     as Tim
31import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base               as B
32import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Message       as Msg
33
34
35-- ----------------------  Modified Julian Day
36
37-- | Synonym for MJD type.
38type Mjd = Tim.Day
39
40-- | Extract MJD integer value.
41mjdInteger :: Mjd -> Integer
42mjdInteger = Tim.toModifiedJulianDay
43
44-- | Convert to the Modified Julian Day.
45class ToMjd a where
46    toMjd :: a -> Mjd
47
48instance ToMjd Tim.Day where
49    toMjd = id
50
51-- | >>> toMjd (55555 :: Int)
52--   2010-12-25
53instance ToMjd Int where
54    toMjd = Tim.ModifiedJulianDay . fromIntegral
55
56-- | >>> toMjd (55555 :: Integer)
57--   2010-12-25
58instance ToMjd Integer where
59    toMjd = Tim.ModifiedJulianDay
60
61instance Num Tim.Day where
62    x + y        = toMjd (mjdInteger x + mjdInteger y)
63    x - y        = toMjd (mjdInteger x - mjdInteger y)
64    x * y        = toMjd (mjdInteger x * mjdInteger y)
65    abs          = toMjd . abs . mjdInteger
66    signum       = toMjd . signum . mjdInteger
67    fromInteger  = toMjd
68
69-- | Convert to the Modified Just Day but abortable.
70class ToMjdClip a where
71    toMjdClip :: a -> Mjd
72
73    toMjdAb :: a -> B.Ab Mjd
74    toMjdAb = Right . toMjdClip
75
76
77-- ---------------------------------  Day of wekk
78
79-- | Symbol of day of week.
80data Dayw
81    = Monday      -- ^ __1.__ Day of the moon.
82    | Tuesday     -- ^ __2.__ Day of Mars
83    | Wednesday   -- ^ __3.__ Day between Tuesday and Thursday.
84    | Thursday    -- ^ __4.__ Day of thunder.
85    | Friday      -- ^ __5.__ Day of Venus.
86    | Saturday    -- ^ __6.__ Day of Saturn.
87    | Sunday      -- ^ __7.__ Day of the sun.
88      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
89
90instance Enum Dayw where
91    fromEnum Monday     = 1
92    fromEnum Tuesday    = 2
93    fromEnum Wednesday  = 3
94    fromEnum Thursday   = 4
95    fromEnum Friday     = 5
96    fromEnum Saturday   = 6
97    fromEnum Sunday     = 7
98
99    toEnum 0 = Sunday
100    toEnum 1 = Monday
101    toEnum 2 = Tuesday
102    toEnum 3 = Wednesday
103    toEnum 4 = Thursday
104    toEnum 5 = Friday
105    toEnum 6 = Saturday
106    toEnum 7 = Sunday
107    toEnum n = toEnum $ mod n 7
108
109-- | Day of week.
110--
111--   >>> mjdDayw (55555 :: Int)
112--   Saturday
113--
114mjdDayw :: (ToMjd day) => day -> Dayw
115mjdDayw day = let (_, _, d) = Tim.toWeekDate $ toMjd day
116              in toEnum d
117
118-- | Interval of weekday to next weekday.
119--
120--   >>> daywDiff Wednesday Saturday
121--   3
122--
123--   >>> daywDiff Saturday Wednesday
124--   4
125--
126daywDiff :: Dayw -> Dayw -> Int
127daywDiff from to
128    | from > to  = fromEnum to - fromEnum from + 7
129    | otherwise  = fromEnum to - fromEnum from
130
131
132-- ---------------------------------  Date
133
134-- | Year type.
135type Year = Integer
136
137-- | Week type.
138type Week = Int
139
140-- | Month type.
141type Month = Int
142
143-- | Day type.
144type Day = Int
145
146-- | Decomposed date.
147data DateParts
148    = DateMjd  Mjd                  -- ^ MJD date
149    | DateYmd  Year Month Day       -- ^ Monthly date
150    | DateYwd  Year Week Dayw       -- ^ Weekly date
151    | DateYd   Year Day             -- ^ Yearly date
152    | DateEom  Year Month           -- ^ End of month
153    | DateYmnd Year Month Int Dayw  -- ^ /N/\'th day of week in a month
154      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
155
156-- | Monthly date parts.
157dateYmd :: Year -> Month -> Day -> DateParts
158dateYmd = DateYmd
159
160-- | Weekly date parts.
161dateYwd :: Year -> Week -> Dayw -> DateParts
162dateYwd = DateYwd
163
164-- | Yearly date parts.
165dateYd :: Year -> Day -> DateParts
166dateYd = DateYd
167
168-- | End of month.
169dateEom :: Year -> Month -> DateParts
170dateEom = DateEom
171
172-- | /N/\'th day of week in a month
173--
174--   >>> toMjdClip $ dateYmnd 2013 4 3 Thursday
175--   2013-04-18
176--
177dateYmnd :: Year -> Month -> Int -> Dayw -> DateParts
178dateYmnd = DateYmnd
179
180instance ToMjdClip DateParts where
181    toMjdClip (DateMjd mjd)       = mjd
182    toMjdClip (DateYmd  y m d)    = Tim.fromGregorian   y m d
183    toMjdClip (DateYwd  y w d)    = Tim.fromWeekDate    y w (fromEnum d)
184    toMjdClip (DateYd   y d)      = Tim.fromOrdinalDate y d
185    toMjdClip (DateEom  y m)      = Tim.fromGregorian   y m 31
186    toMjdClip (DateYmnd y m n d)  = toMjdClip $ monthlyYmnd y m n d
187
188    toMjdAb (DateMjd   mjd)      = Right mjd
189    toMjdAb (DateYmd   y m d)    = abMjd (Msg.notMonthlyDate y m d) $ Tim.fromGregorianValid   y m d
190    toMjdAb (DateYwd   y w d)    = let d' = fromEnum d
191                                   in abMjd (Msg.notWeeklyDate y w d') $ Tim.fromWeekDateValid y w d'
192    toMjdAb (DateYd    y d)      = abMjd (Msg.notYearlyDate  y d)   $ Tim.fromOrdinalDateValid y d
193    toMjdAb d@(DateEom _ _)      = Right $ toMjdClip d
194    toMjdAb (DateYmnd  y m n d)  = toMjdAb $ monthlyYmnd y m n d
195
196abMjd :: B.Ab Mjd -> Maybe Mjd -> B.Ab Mjd
197abMjd _ (Just mjd) = Right mjd
198abMjd a (Nothing)  = a
199
200monthlyYmnd :: Year -> Month -> Int -> Dayw -> DateParts
201monthlyYmnd y m n d = let diff = daywDiff (bomDayw y m) d
202                      in DateYmd y m (diff + 1 + 7 * (n - 1))
203
204-- | Day of week of the beginning of month.
205bomDayw :: Year -> Month -> Dayw
206bomDayw y m = mjdDayw $ Tim.fromGregorian y m 1
207
208
209-- ---------------------------------  Clock
210
211-- | Integer type for the Modified Julian Day.
212type Days = Integer
213
214-- | Hour type.
215type Hour = Int
216
217-- | Minute type.
218type Min = Int
219
220-- | Second type.
221type Sec = Int
222
223-- | Decomposed clock.
224data ClockParts
225    = ClockPartsSec  Days Hour Min Sec
226    | ClockPartsMin  Days Hour Min
227    | ClockPartsHour Days Hour
228    | ClockPartsDays Days
229      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
230
231-- | Clock parts of days, hour, minute, and second.
232clockDhms :: Days -> Hour -> Min -> Sec -> ClockParts
233clockDhms = ClockPartsSec
234
235-- | Clock parts of days, hour, and minute.
236clockDhm :: Days -> Hour -> Min -> ClockParts
237clockDhm = ClockPartsMin
238
239-- | Clock parts of days and hour.
240clockDh :: Days -> Hour -> ClockParts
241clockDh = ClockPartsHour
242
243-- | Clock parts of days only.
244clockD :: Days -> ClockParts
245clockD = ClockPartsDays
